title: Fix base URL interceptor deadlock risk in NetworkModule
Remote server URL ignored - connects to localhost instead of entered URL
description: When entering a remote server URL (e.g. http://192.168.24.25:4096) and tapping Connect, the app attempts to connect to localhost:4096 instead. Error shown: 'Failed to connect to localhost/[::1]:4096'. The entered URL is displayed correctly in the UI but not used for the actual connection.
close_reason: Fixed by adding baseUrlInterceptor to OkHttpClient in NetworkModule.kt
